snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 28S rRNA G4362 : SNORD1A, SNORD1B,SNORD1C (comment in snoRNABase) modified box D by Konishi 09/01/27 (20100701末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から1nt増やし3'側から1nt増やした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Maden, B. E. (1990). The numerous modified nucleotides in eukaryotic ribosomal RNA. Prog Nucleic Acid Res Mol Biol, 39, 241-303. Zhou, H., Zhao, J., Yu, C. H., Luo, Q. J., Chen, Y. Q., Xiao, Y., and Qu, L. H. (2004). Identification of a novel box C/D snoRNA from mouse nucleolar cDNA library. Gene, 327, 99-105.
